teaser: Soundcloud will turn six-years-old at the end of this month. In the last two years alone, Soundcloud's registered users have increased 400 percent to 40 million.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, July 18, 2013
contentencoded:
Soundcloud will turn six-years-old at the end of this month. It started off as a way for audio nerds to easily upload music and other sounds online -- and it has spread from there. In the last two years alone, Soundcloud's registered users have increased 400 percent to 40 million.

Alex Jung, Soundcloud's co-founder and CEO, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss the company's founding and recent success.
title: Soundcloud wants you to see and touch sound
description: Soundcloud will turn six-years-old at the end of this month. In the last two years alone, Soundcloud's registered users have increased 400 percent to 40 million.
